name: SPORT1 Live : Duel
description: Which Team has won the last Champions League? Who scored the “Wembley Goal”, causing the 3:2 at the World Cup 1966? Which record established France in the UEFA Cup season 1997-1998? Do you have the answer for all questions? Then hurry up and play the ultimate Football Cup quiz SPORT 1 Live : Duel and boast your knowledge of football.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2GHz Intel or AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6800GT / AMD Radeon HD 3650 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
